item.title: OpenAI、谷歌和 xAI 争夺人工智能巨星人才，耗资数百万美元
item.description: 硅谷主导人工智能的竞争正在一个新的舞台上上演：超级研究人员。【原文：The contest in Silicon Valley to dominate artificial intelligence is playing out on a new court: superstar researchers.】

item.title: 独家：黑客攻破特朗普助手使用的通信应用程序，窃取了美国政府各部门的数据
item.description: 据路透社报道，本月早些时候，一名黑客入侵了特朗普前国家安全顾问迈克-瓦尔兹使用的通信服务，截获的美国官员信息比之前报道的范围更广，这可能会增加这次入侵事件的风险，而这次事件已经引起了人们对特朗普政府数据安全的质疑。【原文：A hacker who breached the communications service used by former Trump national security adviser Mike Waltz earlier this month intercepted messages from a broader swathe of American officials than has previously been reported, according to a Reuters review, potentially raising the stakes of a breach that has already drawn questions about data security in the Trump administration.】

item.title: 意大利人和 "lo spread"--一种时过境迁的痴迷
item.description: 在 2011 年欧元区债务危机期间，当意大利的借贷成本飙升至不可持续的水平时，一个以前从未使用过的英语单词悄然出现在意大利语中。【原文：A previously unused English word crept into the Italian language during the euro zone debt crisis of 2011 as the country's borrowing costs soared to unsustainable levels.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：OpenAI 最大数据中心获 116 亿美元融资
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，初创公司 Crusoe 在德克萨斯州为 OpenAI 建造的数据中心已获得 116 亿美元的融资，将从两栋大楼扩展到八栋大楼。【原文：A data center in Texas that startup Crusoe is building for OpenAI has secured $11.6 billion in funding to expand from two to eight buildings, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普税改法案僵持不下，美股期货下挫，债券收益率攀升
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货下滑，国债收益率飙升，投资者对财政问题的焦虑与日俱增，他们关注的焦点是围绕美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的减税法案展开的讨论，该法案一直受到共和党内讧的困扰。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped and Treasury yields surged on Wednesday amid growing fiscal anxiety as investors focused on discussions around U.S. President Donald Trump's tax-cut bill that has been plagued by Republican infighting.】

item.title: 马来西亚政府称未参与涉及华为芯片的本地人工智能项目
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部周三在一份声明中表示，马来西亚政府没有开发、协调或认可涉及一家本地公司和华为技术公司的人工智能项目。【原文：Malaysia's government did not develop, coordinate or endorse an artificial intelligence project involving a local company and Huawei Technologies, its trade ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美敦力将分拆糖尿病业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，医疗设备制造商美敦力公司计划将其糖尿病业务独立出来。【原文：Medical device maker Medtronic plans to separate its diabetes business into a stand-alone company, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行毫不怀疑美联储将继续向海外供应美元
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）周三表示，欧洲央行监管机构正在分析欧元区银行的美元风险敞口，但毫无疑问，美国联邦储备委员会将继续在压力时期提供流动性。【原文：European Central Bank supervisors are analysing the dollar exposure of euro zone banks but there is no doubt the U.S. Federal Reserve will continue to supply liquidity at times of stress, ECB vice president Luis de Guindos said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 受助于人工智能需求激增，中国百度第一季度营收超出预期
item.description: 搜索引擎巨头百度周三公布，受人工智能云服务需求增长的推动，第一季度营收意外增长。【原文：Search engine giant Baidu , on Wednesday reported a surprise rise in first-quarter revenue fueled by increasing demand for its AI cloud services.】

item.title: 巴黎击败伦敦，被评为欧洲领先的科技生态系统
item.description: 根据收集初创企业和风险投资公司信息的 Dealroom 提供的数据，巴黎被评为新的欧洲科技冠军，在某些指标上首次击败了伦敦。【原文：Paris has been named as the new European tech champion, beating London for the first time on some metrics, according to data from Dealroom, which collects information on startups and venture capital firms.】

item.title: 欧盟在海关改革中考虑对网上包裹征收 2 欧元手续费
item.description: 欧盟委员会将提议对网上订购并进入欧盟的包裹收取 2 欧元（2.27 美元）的手续费，作为处理数十亿入境包裹的海关系统改革的一部分。【原文：The European Commission is set to propose a 2 euro ($2.27) handling fee for packages ordered online and entering the European Union as part of reforms of its customs system to handle the billions of incoming parcels.】

item.title: 登记显示，俄罗斯石油公司控制了俄罗斯最大的稀土矿床
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的石油生产商俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）收购了俄罗斯最大的稀土金属矿藏 Tomtor。【原文：Russia's largest oil producer Rosneft acquired Tomtor, country's largest rare earth metal deposit, a companies registry showed on Wednesday, after President Vladimir Putin last year urged that the development of the field be speeded up.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告称，繁荣的市场与不确定的世界 "不同步
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周三表示，繁荣的信贷和股票市场似乎与地缘政治和贸易不确定性所笼罩的世界 "格格不入"。【原文：Buoyant credit and stock markets appear "out of sync" with a world gripped by geopolitical and trade uncertainty, the European Central Bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增产，再次瞄准美国页岩油
item.description: 在 "欧佩克+"计划提高石油产量并惩罚产量过剩的盟国的背后，该集团领导人沙特阿拉伯和俄罗斯正在推动第二个目标：打击美国页岩油生产，从美国手中夺回市场份额。【原文：Behind OPEC+'s plan to ramp up oil output and punish over-producing allies, group leaders Saudi Arabia and Russia are pushing a second objective: taking on U.S. shale production to win back market share from the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道美国摇摆不定，乌克兰要求欧盟牵头制裁俄罗斯
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）放弃了加强制裁，乌克兰将于下周要求欧盟考虑采取新的重大措施孤立莫斯科，包括扣押俄罗斯资产和对俄罗斯石油的一些买家实施制裁。【原文：Ukraine will ask the EU next week to consider big new steps to isolate Moscow, including seizing Russian assets and bringing in sanctions for some buyers of Russian oil, as U.S. President Donald Trump has backed off from tightening sanctions.】

item.title: LME WEEK：特朗普的铜关税威胁对交易商而言仍是有利可图的赌注
item.description: 分析师们说，只要关税威胁笼罩着市场，只要美国 COMEX 交易所的金属溢价使交易商和生产商有利可图，运往美国的异常大量的铜货就不可能减少。【原文：Unusually large shipments of copper to the United States are unlikely to abate as long as the threat of tariffs hangs over the market and price premiums for the metal on U.S.-based COMEX make deals profitable for traders and producers, analysts said.】

item.title: 意大利反托拉斯结束对迪奥的调查，承诺资助打击剥削劳工行为
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构结束了对路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下迪奥公司及其两个部门是否在道德声明中误导消费者的调查，称虽然没有发现不法行为，但该公司已做出承诺。【原文：Italy's antitrust authority has closed a probe into whether LVMH-owned Dior and two of its units had misled consumers with their ethical statements, saying the company had taken commitments though no wrongdoing had been found.】

item.title: 谷歌与沃尔沃汽车公司深化合作，为汽车开发 Android 软件
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）和 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周三表示，这家瑞典汽车制造商现已成为安卓汽车软件的主要开发合作伙伴，这将使沃尔沃汽车的购买者早在汽车行业竞争对手推出新版本之前就能获得这些软件。【原文：Volvo Cars and Alphabet's Google said on Wednesday the Swedish carmaker was now the lead development partner for Android automotive software, which should give its buyers access to new versions long before they are available via car industry rivals.】

item.title: 聚焦：储能热潮推动电池转型，将镍、钴甩在身后
item.description: 当 Fidra Energy 于 2023 年收购英格兰北部一片占地 55 英亩（22 公顷）的田园时，其将其改造成 1.45 千兆瓦储能设施（建成后将成为欧洲最大的储能设施）的计划还远未完成。【原文：When Fidra Energy acquired a 55-acre (22-hectare) patch of northern England countryside in 2023, its plan to transform it into a 1.45 gigawatt energy storage facility - Europe's largest once completed - was far from a done deal.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，马来西亚将为其芯片制造行业提供激励措施
item.description: 据马来西亚国家媒体周三援引贸易部长的话报道，马来西亚贸易部正计划在 7 月份对国内半导体产业采取激励措施。【原文：Malaysia's trade ministry is planning incentives for its domestic semiconductor industry in July, state media reported on Wednesday, citing the trade minister.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利上调美国股票评级至 "增持
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将其对美国股票的评级提升至 "增持"，理由是尽管政策存在不确定性，但全球经济仍在放缓和扩张。【原文：Morgan Stanley upgraded its stance on U.S. equities to "overweight", citing a slowing but still expanding global economy despite policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 需求强劲，阿提哈德航空第一季度利润跃升 30
item.description: 阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）周三表示，第一季度税后利润跃升 30%，达到 6.85 亿迪拉姆（1.8652 亿美元），原因是需求强劲和运营效率提高。【原文：Etihad Airways' first-quarter profit after tax jumped 30% to 685 million dirhams ($186.52 million), it said on Wednesday, citing strong demand and improved operational efficiency.】

item.title: 英国 JD Sports 第一季度基本销售额下降 2
item.description: 英国体育用品零售商 JD Sports 公布第一季度基本销售额下降 2%，符合其对贸易波动的预期，同时关税的影响也存在不确定性。【原文：British sportswear retailer JD Sports posted a 2% fall in underlying sales for its first quarter, in line with its expectations for volatile trading and amid uncertainty over the impact of tariffs.】

item.title: 英国 M&S 称网络攻击造成 4 亿美元损失
item.description: 英国零售商玛莎百货（Marks & Spencer）周三表示，一次 "高度复杂的网络 "攻击将使其营业利润损失约 3 亿英镑（约合 4.03 亿美元），影响将持续到 7 月份。【原文：British retailer Marks & Spencer said on Wednesday a "highly sophisticated cyber" attack would cost it about 300 million pounds ($403 million) in operating profit, with disruption set to run into July.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局：英国通胀率跃升至高于预期的 3.5
item.description: 周三公布的数据显示，英国 4 月份通胀率飙升超过预期，其中包括英国央行密切关注的领域。【原文：British inflation surged by more than expected in April including in areas watched closely by the Bank of England, according to figures published on Wednesday that are likely to keep the central bank on its path of gradual interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 首席执行官瑞士宝盛预计在减记 1.56 亿美元后不会再出现重大损失
item.description: 瑞士宝盛银行首席执行官斯特凡-博林格（Stefan Bollinger）周三表示，预计不会出现额外的重大信贷损失，此前该银行在对其信贷组合的审查中披露了1.3亿瑞士法郎（约合1.5636亿美元）的净支出。【原文：Julius Baer does not expect additional major credit losses, CEO Stefan Bollinger said on Wednesday, after the Swiss bank revealed a net charge of 130 million Swiss francs ($156.36 million) in a review of its credit portfolio.】

item.title: 斯沃琪家族哈耶克面临考验，投资者力邀其加入董事会
item.description: 本周三，斯沃琪集团的主宰家族将面临一次不同寻常的考验，一位美国投资者将试图在这家瑞士制表商的董事会中占据一席之地，以求在其业绩下滑之后扭转颓势。【原文：The family that dominates Swatch Group faces an unusual test on Wednesday when an American investor tries to secure a place on the Swiss watchmaker's board, bidding to shake up its performance after a slide in its fortunes.】

item.title: 国际能源署称，关键矿产市场多样性不足可能会损害工业发展
item.description: 国际能源署（IEA）在周三的一份报告中指出，随着矿产市场的集中化，特别是在精炼和加工领域，以及出口限制的扩大，关键矿产市场正面临着令人痛苦的混乱风险。【原文：Critical mineral markets are at risk of painful disruptions after becoming more concentrated, particularly in refining and processing, and with the spread of export restrictions, the IEA said in a report on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，国际货币基金组织（IMF）戈皮纳斯敦促美国遏制财政赤字
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三发表的一篇采访报道称，国际货币基金组织第一副总裁吉塔-戈皮纳特（Gita Gopinath）表示，美国财政赤字过大，需要解决 "不断增加的 "债务负担。【原文：International Monetary Fund First Deputy Managing Director Gita Gopinath said U.S. fiscal deficits are too large and the country needs to tackle its "ever-increasing" debt burden, according to an interview published by the Financial Times on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：紧张的投资者令美元承压
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】
